movies.title: L'ultimo capodanno
movies.plot: New year's eve at "The Islands" condos. An aging countess's party is crashed by the soccer team from her gigolo's town. While dressing for a dinner party, the wealthy Guilia discovers her husband's affair with her best friend and vows revenge. Next door, a family prepares their vintage Dodge for a drive through the streets. A call girl ties up a lawyer while, unbeknownst to him, three men await the right moment to break into his office. Across the hall, a woman downs pills in a lonely suicide attempt. Two young men hide out in a bedroom smoking dope; one of them has some dynamite. As midnight approaches, each group draws closer to grotesque tragedy.
movies.simplePlot: New year's eve at "The Islands" condos. An aging countess's party is crashed by the soccer team from her gigolo's town. While dressing for a dinner party, the wealthy Guilia discovers her ...

biography.bio: Max Mazzotta is an actor, known for L'ultimo capodanno (1998), Tell Me About Love (2008) and The Goodbye Kiss (2006).
biography.name: Max Mazzotta

biography.bio: Monica Anna Maria Bellucci was born on September 30, 1964 in the Italian village of Città di Castello, Umbria, the only child of Brunella Briganti and Pasquale Bellucci. She originally pursued a career in the legal profession. While attending the University of Perugia, she modeled on the side to earn money for school, and this led to her modeling career. In 1988, she moved to one of Europe's fashion centers, Milan, and joined Elite Model Management. Although enjoying great success as a model, she made her acting debut on television in 1990, and her American film debut in Bram Stoker's Bram Stoker's Dracula (1992). Her role in the French thriller The Apartment (1996), shot her to stardom as she won the French equivalent of an Oscar nomination. Other credits include Malena (2000), Suspicion (2000) and Brotherhood of the Wolf (2001).
biography.name: Monica Bellucci

biography.bio: Beppe Fiorello was born on March 12, 1969 in Catania, Sicily, Italy as Giuseppe Fiorello. He is an actor and writer, known for The Talented Mr. Ripley (1999), Terraferma (2011) and A Magnificent Haunting (2012). He has been married to Eleonora Pratelli since October 16, 2010. They have two children.
biography.name: Beppe Fiorello

biography.bio: Marco Giallini was born on April 4, 1963 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor, known for Perfect Strangers (2016), A.C.A.B. (2012) and Tutta colpa di Freud (2014).
biography.name: Marco Giallini

biography.bio: Claudio Santamaria was born on July 22, 1974 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor, known for Casino Royale (2006), They Call Me Jeeg (2015) and Diaz: Un crime d'état (2012).
biography.name: Claudio Santamaria

biography.bio: Alessandro Haber was born on January 19, 1947 in Bologna, Italy. He is an actor and director, known for The Unknown Woman (2006), Chiara e gli altri (1989) and The Conformist (1970).
biography.name: Alessandro Haber

biography.bio: Ludovica Modugno was born on January 12, 1949 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is known for her work on Steam: The Turkish Bath (1997), Quo vado? (2016) and Maria, He Doesn't Like It (2009). She was previously married to Gigi Angelillo.
biography.name: Ludovica Modugno

biography.bio: Piero Natoli was born on November 22, 1947 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Pietro Natoli. He was an actor and writer, known for Ladri di cinema (1996), Juste un baiser (2001) and Chi c'è c'è (1987). He died on May 8, 2001 in Rome.
biography.name: Piero Natoli

biography.bio: Iva Zanicchi was born on January 18, 1940 in Ligonchio, Emilia-Romagna, Italy. She is an actress, known for OK, il prezzo è giusto! (1983), L'ultimo capodanno (1998) and Una ragazza tutta d'oro (1967).
biography.name: Iva Zanicchi

biography.bio: Maria Monti was born on June 26, 1935 in Milan, Lombardy, Italy as Maria Monticelli. She is an actress, known for Duck, You Sucker (1971), 1900 (1976) and What Have You Done to Solange? (1972).
biography.name: Maria Monti

biography.bio: Giorgio Tirabassi was born on February 1, 1960 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor and director, known for Distretto di polizia (2000), Piazza Fontana (2012) and La pecora nera (2010).
biography.name: Giorgio Tirabassi

biography.bio: Ricky Memphis was born on August 29, 1968 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Riccardo Fortunati. He is an actor, known for Distretto di polizia (2000), Ultrà (1991) and L'escorte (1993).
biography.name: Ricky Memphis

biography.bio: Natale Tulli was an actor, known for L'ultimo capodanno (1998), Mélodie meurtrière (1979) and Mezzo destro mezzo sinistro - 2 calciatori senza pallone (1985). He died on July 16, 2014.
biography.name: Natale Tulli

biography.bio: Giovanni Ferreri was born on September 9, 1960 in Naples, Campania, Italy. He is an actor, known for Distretto di polizia (2000), A Neapolitan Spell (2002) and L'amore non ha confini (1998).
biography.name: Giovanni Ferreri

biography.bio: Francesca d'Aloja was born on April 21, 1963 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is an actress and director, known for Steam: The Turkish Bath (1997), Le dîner (1998) and Tre mogli (2001).
biography.name: Francesca d'Aloja
